SENT.plain: The authors studied the effect of transcranial ultrasound on patients with acute middle cerebral artery occlusion and contraindications for thrombolysis
Fifteen consecutive subjects were randomized for insonation over 1 hour or for inclusion in a control group
By day 4, recanalization and neurologic improvement occurred more frequently in the target group
Ultrasound-induced acceleration of clot dissolution may be an option for patients with contraindications for recombinant tissue plasminogen activator
